name: As Time Goes By (danthevampire)
description:
Story

Have you ever felt like your time was whisked away?

Thought to yourself, "5 more minutes won't hurt," only to wake up hours later?  Unfortunately, that means you're time was taken from you. 

In this world, time is watched over by the Tempus. These beings make sure it flows correctly for all creatures. It's part of their job to prevent time anomalies just like that from happening. 

You play a newly appointed Keeper. Solve mysteries, mend relationships, and discover just what's lurking in the shadows of twilight. 

This is a short demo! I wanted to participate in NaNoRenO 2023 and this was the result.

Multiple endings, romantic/friendship routes, and more are planned for a potential full release. There currently isn't a gallery but there is a codex. Please enjoy the very beginning of this story. 

Characters

Let's meet the characters you'll interact with in this demo!

From left to right

Lynn - They/She/He

Kierce - He/They 

Octavin - He/Him
